author: Second Wind
description:
This video is brought to you by Guards II: Chaos in Hell, the upcoming turn-based tactics game with extremely simple rules, but even more extremely deep mechanics. – https://store.steampowered.com/app/2958570/Guards_II_Chaos_in_Hell/

This week on Hidden Gems, KC, Jess, and Jesse try out Shady Knight -- https://store.steampowered.com/app/1155650/Shady_Knight/

If you dig Hot Monday Energy, consider supporting us over on Patreon -- https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Check out some of our lovely merch over at our DFTBA store -- https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind

Listen to the Hidden Gems songs here --

title: Checking Out Shady Knight's Stylish Dance of Death | Hidden Gems

author: Second Wind
description:
This video is brought to you by Guards II: Chaos in Hell, the upcoming turn-based tactics game with extremely simple rules, but even more extremely deep mechanics. – https://store.steampowered.com/app/2958570/Guards_II_Chaos_in_Hell/

On this week’s episode of Windbreaker, Yahtzee, JM8, and Marty chat about which games they personally think represent the "peak" of each of the major genres.

If you dig the stuff we make, consider supporting us over at Patreon -- https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Grab yourself a "Let's All Laugh at an Industry..." shirt over at our DFTBA store -- https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind
title: The Peaks of Every Genre | Windbreaker Podcast
